author: the Klebeian Group

changelog.release_notes: Stopped using AppSync, replaced with AppMessage. Major internal rewrite.
Emergency stability fixes by reducing APP_SYNC dictionary size
changed sync_buffer and app_sync_init to appropriate values

Emergency fix to support 2.5. Having difficulty with dictionary size, for now disabled 3-day forecast, so you get today's conditions, today's forecast and tonight's forecast. (temp, conditions and time for each). Trying to fix .... if you're a developer let me know if you'd like to help me figure this one out.
Remove hard-coded city name "Portlandia" from build.
Complete rewrite, now wrist-flicks change from current conditions, to today's forecast and 3 day forecast.
Added support for your choice of temperature scales: Fahrenheit, Celsius, Kelvin, Rankine, Réaumur, Rømer, Newton and Delisle
Removed app logging, cleaned up script, addressed bug when installing on Android

description:
Shows current weather, today's forecast, tonight (or tomorrow morning's forecast), and the following 3 days. Supports 8 different temperature scales, if you prefer Kelvin or Rankine to Celsius and Fahrenheit. 

Still to do: 12/24 clock; change in font size if the city name is gigantic.

latest_release.release_notes: Stopped using AppSync, replaced with AppMessage. Major internal rewrite.

title: FM Weather
